attributes.title: absolutely horrible

attributes.review:
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!!! it was so absolutely horrifying i am SCARRED for life. first when i opened the app i thought all was fine and i had nothing to worry about, but thats where the normality stopped. the next few days started getting weirder and weirder with strange occurrences like someone trying to break in to my house, my car getting stolen, i got fired from my job for no reason, then i would feel there was someone watching me out of the corner of my eye, or i could feel a breathe on the back of my neck that would make my hair stand on edge. i was never truly alone even when i thought i was. items in my house would go missing, food would disappear from my fridge and i had a near death experience almost twice a day. the strangest experience was when i should have been asleep. i could see something, a large misshapen figure, moving in the dark but i didnt dare confront them, my body paralyzed with fear. the figure would get closer and closer until it was standing directly over my trembling body. this would occur every night and the figure would stare at me for hours, dark steely eyes peering directly into my withering soul. but then one night i finally grew the courage to ask the figure what it wanted. it stayed silent. i asked again, louder this time. the figure only grew closer to me. i asked once more, this time almost a scream. it only came closer to me and i could feel its cold breath on my face and it was only then i could decipher who exactly had been stalking me all these nights. it was donald j trump. then he got even closer to me putting his mouth to my ear and said so faintly, almost a whisper, the j stands for genius. i reached for my phone and deleted the app and he vanished out of sight. this experience was so deeply haunting but i had to write it to warn everyone before they download it, nobody should have to go through what i did. 

also im not CALLING tr*mp a racist orange cheeto puff oompa loompa with the mentality and common sense of a five year old that had too much cough syrup but if the shoe fits ya know!
attributes.title: most terrifying experience of my life
